course_name: LANG 51: Elementary Intensive Less Commonly Taught Language for Graduate Students I
description: Intensive introduction to a less commonly taught language: first half of elementary sequence in reading, writing, speaking, listening, cultural contexts.

course_name: LANG 52: Elementary Intensive Less Commonly Taught Language for Graduate Students II
description: Intensive introduction to a less commonly taught language: second half of elementary sequence in reading, writing, speaking, listening, cultural contexts.

course_name: LANG 53: Intermediate Intensive Less Commonly Taught Language for Graduate Students
description: Continued intensive study of a less commonly taught language at the intermediate level: reading, writing, speaking, listening, cultural contexts.
prerequisite: LANG 052 or equivalent and graduate standing

description: Courses offered in foreign countries by individual or group instruction.
